Class Automatic.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automatic.android.sdk.Automatic.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Automatic

    public static class Automatic.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to create an SDK instance.

    • Method Detail

      • addScopes

        public Automatic.Builder addScopes(Scope[] scopes)
        Add multiple scopes here, e.g.: addScopes(Scope.Public, Scope.Location, Scope.Vin);
        Parameters:
        scopes - varargs of scopes to add. Old scopes will not be deleted. If a scope is already added, it will be skipped.
        Returns:
        instance of Builder

      • addScope

        public Automatic.Builder addScope(Scope scope)
        Add an individual scope to the API context
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope to add
        Returns:
        Builder instance

      • useLoginButton

        public Automatic.Builder useLoginButton(LoginButton loginButton,
                               Activity activity)
        Add a LoginButton instance
        Parameters:
        loginButton - your LoginButton
        activity - your Activity
        Returns:
        Builder instance

      • autoLogIn

        public Automatic.Builder autoLogIn(boolean autoLogIn)
        Set whether to auto log in using local Automatic account
        Parameters:
        autoLogIn - true to log in using local Automatic account
        Returns:
        Builder instance

      • logLevel

        public Automatic.Builder logLevel(LogLevel level)
        Set the log level of the SDK
        Parameters:
        level - Retrofit log level
        Returns:
        Builder instance

      • useServiceBinding

        public Automatic.Builder useServiceBinding()
        Called within the Builder to allow usage of the AutomaticService binding. Note: Before the service can be bound, the user must be logged in with OAuth.
        Returns:
        Builder instance
